name: violator
content:
violator noun [C]
(OF LAW)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person or organization that acts against something, especially a law, agreement, principle, or something that should be treated with respect: The regime is one of the worst violators of human rights in the world. More than one-third of New Mexico's prison admissions are parole violators.
More examplesFewer examplesViolators of the law could face a $250 fine.Officers will focus on curfew violators in parks, beaches and neighbourhoods.Violators are seldom prosecuted and corruption is widespread.
